title: Dome of the Rock religious context

content.question:
The building shown is the Dome of the Rock in Jerusalem.

With which religion is the building directly associated? Discuss the building’s structure and ornamentation in relation to its religious significance.

frqParts.text:
The building shown is the Dome of the Rock in Jerusalem.

With which religion is the building directly associated? Discuss the building’s structure and ornamentation in relation to its religious significance.

unit.text: 7: West and Central Asia, 500 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 7.2: Purpose and Audience in West and Central Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
